unnamed:Devastation.DESCRIPTION: Limited. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times. Double this card's damage. Exhaust 6 random cards.
unnamed:Devastation.NAME: Devastation
unnamed:Devastation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Limited. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times. Triple this card's damage. Exhaust 6 random cards.

unnamed:Reaper.DESCRIPTION: Kill EVERYTHING below !M! HP. Whenever you play a card, increase this number by !SV!.
unnamed:Reaper.NAME: Death

unnamed:Time.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] at the start of each turn. At the end of each turn, take 10 damage for each unspent energy.
unnamed:Time.NAME: Time

unnamed:Abyss.DESCRIPTION: Apply X - !M! Doomed to ALL enemies.
unnamed:Abyss.NAME: Abyss

unnamed:Ascent.DESCRIPTION: ALL cards are played twice this turn. Exhaust.
unnamed:Ascent.NAME: Ascent

unnamed:Noise.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, deal !D! damage.
unnamed:Noise.NAME: Noise

unnamed:Glass.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card. Discard your leftmost card.
unnamed:Glass.NAME: Glass

unnamed:Rupture.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if the enemy has !M! different [#EFC851]Debuffs. Deal !D! damage.
unnamed:Rupture.NAME: Rupture

unnamed:Sun.DESCRIPTION: The next time you would take damage, heal that many HP instead. Purge.
unnamed:Sun.NAME: Sun

unnamed:Dimension.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. Transform ALL cards in your hand into copies of it.
unnamed:Dimension.NAME: Dimension

unnamed:Shine.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. Transform ALL cards in your hand into copies of it.
unnamed:Shine.NAME: Shine

unnamed:Visions.DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 additional cards at the start of each turn. ALL cards are Ethereal.
unnamed:Visions.NAME: Visions

unnamed:Darkness.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! HP. Draw 1 card for each enemy.
unnamed:Darkness.NAME: Darkness
